participant_1.background:
My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it.
i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books.
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
i like listening to blues music.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

participant_2.background:
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.

content.text: hey! How's it going?
hi! I'm doing pretty good, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing okay! I'm trying to quit smoking, but it's tough.
oh, I'm sorry to hear that! I know it can be really hard to quit.
yeah, it is. But I'm determined to do it.
that's great! I'm rooting for you!
thanks! I appreciate that.
what are you up to today?
not much, just working on my novel. I'm a writer.
oh, that's awesome! I'm a barista, so I'm working right now.
cool! what's your favorite thing about your job?
I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.
that sounds really cool! I wish I was good at making coffee.
it's not too hard to learn! you should give it a try sometime.
maybe I will! thanks for the suggestion.
no problem!
so, what do you like to do for fun?
I like spending time with my family, reading, and collecting vintage clothing.
that sounds really fun! I love reading too.
yeah, it's a great way to relax.
what are some of your favorite books?
I love the game of thrones series, and I also like reading historical fiction.
oh, I've heard good things about the game of thrones series.
yeah, it's really good! I'm excited for the new season to come out.
me too! so, what's your favorite vintage clothing piece?
I have a really cool vintage dress from the 1950s. I love it
